title: Pinterest Clone App
description: A full-featured Pinterest-like web application where users can explore, create, and save visual content. Built using React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS. The app supports user authentication, image uploads, and interactive UI components.
details: This Pinterest clone replicates the essential functionalities of the original platform, including creating pins, browsing categorized boards, user registration/login, and storing user preferences. Images are handled via Cloudinary, with API security, MongoDB data models, and responsive design using Tailwind CSS. The project is structured with a scalable backend and clean component-based frontend architecture.
features: Full user authentication using JWT and bcrypt
Pin creation with title, description, and image uploads
Drag-and-drop masonry-style layout for displaying pins
Board creation for organizing pins
Image hosting using Cloudinary with secure API
Profile page to view user's boards and saved pins
Real-time search and filtering by category
Responsive and mobile-friendly layout
Error handling and loading states for better UX

title: Country Information System
description: An informative and responsive web app that displays detailed data about countries across the globe. Built with React, TypeScript, REST Countries API, and styled using Tailwind CSS. Designed for simplicity, speed, and clean user interface.
details: The Country Info System provides users with a searchable list of countries and dynamically loads content using REST Countries API. It supports dark/light mode, detailed view for each country including flags, population, maps, subregions, and multilingual data. Utilizes TypeScript for better development experience and safer component logic. Designed to be lightweight and SEO-friendly.
features: Live country search with auto filtering
REST API integration to fetch country data
Display of flags, capital, population, currency, and languages
Dark/light theme toggle using Context API
Type-safe React components using TypeScript
Clean and minimal UI with responsive design
Single-page country detail view with back navigation
Mobile-optimized interface
Reusable card and layout components
